projects.summary: We developed a community feature on Microsoft Teams to attract and empower vommunity owners to build and grow communities on Teams for daily and recreational use.

projects.name: Mixplorer: A Mixed-Reality Object Placement Data Collection Tool
projects.summary: We created a mixed-reality object placement data collection tool, instantiating human-in-the-loop human-AI collaboration where AI provides suggestions and users modify the suggestions for model improvement.

projects.name: Why Antiwork: A RoBERTa-Based System forWork-Related Stress Identification and Leading Factor Analysis
projects.summary: Leveraging a subreddit as a data source, we create and train a model to detect antiwork sentiments, revealing that lack of authority, frustrating recruitment experiences, and unfair compensation are major contributors to employee dissatisfaction and antiwork sentiments. (My capstone project at University of Michigan)
